70.name: Lich King
70.greeting:
{Death Chamber}

As you approach the ominous skull structure, you are greeted by a grotesque Lich King. "You have found one of my Death Chambers", the king says in a sinister voice. "I assume you are here to try to steal my ancient treasures? If you enter this chamber, I will punish you with the deadliest force imaginable.  Will you heed my warning or suffer a treacherous death?"
70.visited: As you approach the ominous skull structure, you smell the horrible stench of blood.  Obviously, a battle has already been fought here.
70.reward: Upon defeating the Lich King and his guards, you find valuable gold, Mithril, and @number@ friendly Ghosts that you resurrect from the chamber's ashes!

loan.name: {Loan Bank}
loan.offer:
"We offer you a maximum of @max@ but charge 30% interest. The maximum loan available will increase over time.
Repayment will start tomorrow and we'll take half of the @resource@ in your treasury every day until the loan is repaid."
loan.input: "How many @resource@ (1-@max@) do you want to borrow?"
loan.limit: "I'm sorry, but you can't borrow more than the current maximum of @resource@."
loan.confirm: "Here you are. It was a pleasure doing business with you."
loan.cancel: "Don't worry, we'll keep this offer open for you. Come back whenever you want."
loan.collector: "We take a fee of @taken@, so you still owe us @owe@. We'll come back tomorrow."
loan.paid: "Congratulations. You've paid your last instalment of @taken@. Feel free to visit us again."
loan.debt: "Sorry, but you have an outstanding loan with us. Come back when you've paid your last instalment."

201.ballista_description:
{Ballista}

The Ballista can target your enemy's troops in combat and can deal (1-50 + hero level) points of damage to an enemy unit prior to combat.

201.ammo_description:
{Supply Cart}

The Supply Cart ensures that your missile troops never run out of ammunition in combat and increases the (non-combat) effectiveness of a First Aid Tent and Ballista by 100%.
